citation.article-title: Description of Caldalkalibacillus uzonensis sp. nov. and emended description of the genus Caldalkalibacillus
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Emended description of the genus Caldalkalibacillus Xue et al. 2006
The description is based on that provided by Xue et al. (2006), with the following amendments.
The genus contains catalase-reaction-positive and catalase-reaction-negative species.
Predominant cellular phospholipid fatty acids include iso-C15 : 0, anteiso-C15 : 0 and iso-C17 : 0.
